CheckTitle: Check if RDS events have subscriptions enabled.
Description: Ensure that your Amazon RDS resources have event notifications enabled in order to get notifications when an event occurs for a given database instance, database snapshot, database security group, or database parameter group.
Risk: Monitoring is an essential part of maintaining the availability, reliability, and performance of your Amazon RDS resources. Enabling event notifications will keep you up-to-date on everything that's going with your Amazon RDS database resources.

Code.CLI: aws rds create-event-subscription --region us-east-1 --subscription-name cc-database-backups --sns-topic-arn arn:aws:sns:us-east-1:12345678901:cc-rds-backup-alarm-topic --source-type db-instance --event-categories "backup" --source-ids cc-project5-mysql-database --enabled

Recommendation.Text: To use Enhanced Monitoring, you must create an IAM role, and then enable Enhanced Monitoring.
